title: ME69102: Advanced Manufacturing Laboratory - Quick Facts
text:
ME69102
Course name | ADVANCED MANUFACTURING LABORATORY
Offered by | Mechanical Engineering
Credits | 2
L-T-P | 0-0-3
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Any twelve experiments • Hydraulic Bulge test and Erichsen test • Mechanical properties of powder compacts • Experiments on Rolling, Deep Drawing, Extrusion • Uni-axial compression test to obtain true stress-strain data and to study the effects of lubrication • Plane strain compression test for sheet type of specimen to obtain stressstrain behaviour • CAD software introduction with simple examples. Single object modelling. • Design of product with surface representations. Visualization. CNC Machine cutter path generation. • Design and representation of assembly of objects. Assembly sequencing, disassembly sequencing. Visualisation using VRML. • Design and manufacture of product for Rapid prototyping • Studies on Arc behaviour in shielded metal arc welding • Studies on GTAW, GMAW, GMAW-P processes • Temperature distribution in arc welding • Weld quality tests • Work space analysis of manipulator • Robot teaching using VAL programming • CNC modelling and programming
